feed.title: La Grande Rivière - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , La Grande Rivière
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:00 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -36.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Grande Rivière Airport 9:00 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -36.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -48
Dewpoint: -39.5°C
Wind: WSW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 42 this evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 46 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 24.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near minus 24. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 20. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 33.
